column1: In two studies, we took a subtle latent variable approach to explore how different mind-sets (including mild anxiety, slight social anxiety, minor depression, moderate drinking tendencies, various emotions, balanced intelligence, and diverse personality mind-sets) were simply related to one another and to mild psychological symptoms.
